name: Kripta Kronic
text: Decent pizza, although the store employee making my pizza couldn't follow simple instructions. I was fairly disappointed, however another employee offered a free pizza via gift card, upon next visit. [First visit on 09/01/18] ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Vargas
text: I have always bought pizzas in this place and previously they offered a good service. Today I called to ask for a pizza and the man who answered me told me that if I wanted to, I had to wait an hour and then send me the wrong pizza. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Tre Rounds
text: fantastic pizza.great prices.the staff there is amazing ..helpfull..and polite.there is a female manager there with black hair i did not catch her name.but she is always on point and makes sure my order is 100% correct.cut in squares with crust topping.i get a few pizzas once a week for pizza night..this particular marcos is awesome.

name: Linda Muschott
text: Marco's has always provided  great food, reasonable prices and friendly service for us, We're close enough so we always pick up our order. It's worth the drive to get it fresh üòä REALLY BIG DIFFERENCE!!!

name: manny ponce
text: This is the real deal. Old world pepperoni! And some super awsome toppings. And they deliver!

name: Vera Mahfouz
text: Disappointed! We've had pizza from here before with no problems. We arrived at the appointed time to pick up our pizza. My husband went in, paid for the pizza and proceeded to wait 10-15min before the person behind the counter realized that ‚Ä¶More

name: Vivian 1965
text: My family loves the Marcos pizza from Circleville...their pizza is so good...not greasy...love their sauce and cheese...called in the order they were quick to answer and very polite...the wait is not long...this is our new favorite place...i recommend this location to others...they have provided a good service for my family.

name: Howard Dillan Dillan
text: Tried to get my pizza delivered but they refused to do so to my location. Went and ordered my pizza anyways and went to go get it. Boy at the counter was preoccupied with a girl customer and the guy with a bald head in the back wasn't ‚Ä¶More

text: I didn't hate it it was closed.

name: Lindsay Lebsock
text: Great quick service! Very impressive with the ordering online process! The pizza was delicious!

name: pearl gibson
text: A very nice place and very good pizza

name: Bob Tatz
text: Ordered six pizzas to be delivered to police department in gratitude for case   involving my son's death. Noah, the manager, was super helpful.

name: Judy Myers
text: Pizza us very good. However been at 2 locations one grove city and north high. Had to wait 2 hrs for grove city delivery and called high st for pickup at 1:45 said ready at 2:05. Upon arrival was just going in oven. Counter girl very confused and lost at high st

text: Wow they are so nice, and good pizza with a good price. What more can you ask for.

name: Justin Hendren
text: This location is now closed. It was good, I don't understand why they closed it. It was my #1 Pizza :(

name: Greg Skavaril
text: I WAS a regular customer. I ordered 1 sub  & a small pizza. My Bill was $15.31.I was 2 cents short. They wouldn't let me slide on 2 cents. I have left all kinds of change there in the past. Nothing much, but still. I tried to argue my point but they wouldn't budge. I WON'T GO BACK
